nodes.text: Hercie Beta was a female Human enemy of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. In 3630 BBY she and her partner Frederci Beta were captured and imprisoned in the Overwatch. However, during their interrogation, Kaliyo Djannis and The Commander assaulted the Overwatch, enabling them to escape.
Hercie Beta appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise.
